q:
Identify the correct tense for the given sentence:
We saw the airplane while it was taking off.

Choose the appropriate tense:
How many students in your class _______ from Korea?

Choose the correct option for the present tense:
Do you _______ the day we moved the piano upstairs?

Choose the correct option for tense:
She _______ her job by tomorrow evening.

Choose the correct option for tense:
He _______ the Bharat Ratna award. He was the best.

Find the error:
Do you know that it was I who has done this piece of beautiful work?
options: Do you know that it was I

q:
Find the error:
Neither he nor his brother can walk faster than me.

Choose the proper tense or form of the verb given in brackets:
I _______ not _______ the letter yet. (has, write)

Choose the correct present perfect or simple past form of the verb:
Elizabeth _______ the Queen of England for many years and she is still the Queen.

Identify the correct tense for the given sentence:
Asha has never seen the Red Fort.

Choose the proper tense or form of the verb given in brackets:
I _______ the painting just now. (finish)

Fill in the blank with the Present Perfect Continuous Tense of the verb given in bracket.
He _______ in this school for several years. (teach)
I predict that by 2020, man _______ (land) or Mars.

Identify the correct tense for the given sentence:
The storm has been howling since 4 O'clock.

Choose the correct option for tense:
My sister _______ already _______ the food.

Choose the appropriate tense:
I _______ an apple.

Choose the appropriate tense:
The climate in our city _______ warmer.

Choose the appropriate tense:
Once there _______ a king.

Choose the proper tense or form of the verb given in brackets:
After he _______ the roof _______. (leave, collapse)

Choose the correct option for tense:
Vitamins _______ under protective food.

Choose the correct option for tense:
The mother _______ food for us.
He thought my car _______ for sale.

Choose the appropriate tense:
We _______ TV when it started to rain.
They _______ in an apartment right now because they can't find a cheap house.

Find the error:
His father died of cholera but his mother also though very weak, is out of danger.
options: Though very weak, is out of danger
